name: Francis Crimmins
tagline: I specialise in combining ideas from the research and open source worlds to create new products and systems.
body:
## Summary
Senior Software Engineer.

I specialise in combining ideas from the research and open source worlds to create new products and systems. I have designed and developed a 100 million page web crawler, recommender systems, a program for detecting "spikes" and related queries in search engine logs and a text miner for definitions from web pages.

## Sample Creations

### Recommender Systems

Example of recommended "similar items" overlaid over a StackOverflow question:

![StackoverFlow Recommender Screenshot](../images/stackoverflow-similar-items.png)

This screenshot shows a set of "similar items" being recommended for a given web page. I designed and implemented an algorithm which combines information from multiple sources, such as "co-clicks", "related clicks", "related results" etc. For more details, please see the [Funnelback Recommender System Documentation](http://docs.funnelback.com/recommendations.html).

## Key Skills
* Information Retrieval & Search
* Data Mining
* Analytics
* Distributed Systems
* NoSQL
* Relational Databases
* API Design
* Java

## Education
* M.Sc. in Information Retrieval, [Dublin City University](http://dcu.ie/computing/index.shtml) (1996 - 1998)
* B.Sc. in Computer Applications, Dublin City University (1992 - 1996)

## Contact
* Email: francis.crimmins @ gmail.com
* LinkedIn: [https://www.linkedin.com/in/franciscrimmins](https://www.linkedin.com/in/franciscrimmins)

### Disclaimer
This is a personal site and so the content here is my own and does not necessarily reflect the viewpoint or opinions of my current or previous employers. Details on example systems above refers to publicly available information in the official [Funnelback Documentation](http://docs.funnelback.com/).
